title: The Unrivaled Isekai Adventure Of An Agricultural Science Professor ～Building A Monster Girl Harem With Pharmaceutical Knowledge～
alternative_title: 異世界ドラッグ-薬学知識でモンスター娘たちを虜にして成り上がる- ; 農学博士の異世界無双～禁忌の知識で築くモンスター娘ハーレム～ ; Isekai Drug - Yakugaku Chishiki de Monster Musume-tachi wo Toriko ni shite Nariagaru
status: 異世界ドラッグ-薬学知識でモンスター娘たちを虜にして成り上がる- ; 農学博士の異世界無双～禁忌の知識で築くモンスター娘ハーレム～ ; Isekai Drug - Yakugaku Chishiki de Monster Musume-tachi wo Toriko ni shite Nariagaru
description:
Description :
        One day, Dr. Shiro, a harmless and kind-hearted doctor of agriculture, is transported to another world along with his students and laboratory.  It's a hopeless world where humans are treated as slaves and ruled by monster girls!
In this grim world, he'll use his knowledge of pharmacology to subvert and control the cruel monster girls!
